snippet.title: Guns'n'Glory ZOMBIES - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Official game trailer of 'Guns'n'Glory Zombies' by http://www.handy-games.com. ▶ The Zombie Apocalypse is here and the dead are rising from their graves! Get the game here: www.handy-games.com/games/guns-n-glory-zombies/

When the dead walk the earth, there is only one thing left to do: grab the biggest and baddest weapons you can find and fight for your life! Fire up the chainsaw, refuel the flamethrower and show the rotten monsters that it's a bad idea to shamble into your neighborhood! Just shoot 'em all for fun and profit!

RULES OF SURVIVAL:
KILL the undead!
FIGHT the plague!
DEFEND the last survivors!
MAKE every bullet count!
________________________________________

#GunsnGloryZombies #GnGZ #Fantasy #Gunsnglory #Defense #HandyGames
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/GunsnGlory/271088636347090?fref=ts
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/handygames
Check news on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/handy_games
Stay tuned on Google+: http://goo.gl/qkjngm
Subscribe to our YouTube channel: http://goo.gl/2Kq6yY
